items.title: resume
items.content_html:
# Real name: Zheng ChangQian （郑昌乾）

# Contact Information

  • Mobile: +86 188-1027-7303
  • Email: [domestic] 177434583@qq.com / [international] changqian.zheng@gmail.com
  • GitHub: ckt1i
  • University: Beijing Institute of Technology, School of Cyberspace Security
  • Degree: Undergraduate, 2nd Year

# Academic Achievements

  • Average Score: 88
  • GPA: 3.6/4.0

# Skills and Languages

  • Operating Systems: Linux (Ubuntu)
  • Programming Languages: Python, C, Shell, Java
  • Tools and Environments: MacOS, SSH, Git, Remote Linux / Windows VM
  • Language Proficiency:
    • English: Reading and Writing (Excellent), Speaking and Listening (Daily Communication)

# Computer-Related Skills

  • Proficient in Python and C/C++ programming, with basic knowledge of Java.
  • Experienced in remote programming and project development using Git, with experience in SSH and remote project development.
  • Strong communication and teamwork skills, with good ability to read academic papers and original documents.

# Research and Projects

  • A weak-password checker based on collected malicious passwords
    • Collecting weak-password from fake-ssh or the other password phisher, and using the thought of the Levinstein Distance and patterns to evaluate its strength and give user alerts.
    • Project paper: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ckt1i/blogimage/main/Password_Protection.pdf
  • OpenSSH National Secret Modification Based on OpenSSL (Ongoing Competition Project)
    • Utilized existing national secret SM series algorithms of OpenSSL to modify OpenSSH services. Acted as a team organizer and contributed significantly to project work and programming tasks. Project Link
  • Research on Password Security Issues Based on Honeywords (Innovation Project, Ongoing)
    • Participated in related paper study and other tasks as a team member.
  • AI Backdoor Simulation Attack Based on Badnets (Course Project, Completed)
    • Replicated image recognition simulation attacks using methods from the Badnets paper.
  • AI Voice Synthesis Implementation Based on DDSP-svc (Course Project, Completed)
    • Configured and applied the DDSP-svc voice synthesis model to understand its principles and achieve voice simulation and synthesis.
  • Anonymous Electronic Voting Process Implementation Based on Paillier Algorithm (Course Project, Completed)
    • Implemented the Paillier homomorphic encryption algorithm using Python to simulate an electronic voting system.

# Awards

  • 2023-2024 First Semester Excellent Academic Performance Scholarship
  • 2022-2023 Second Semester Excellent Academic Performance Scholarship
  • 2023 Beijing Institute of Technology Outstanding Communist Youth League Member
  • 2023 Second Prize in Beijing’s 34th University Mathematics Competition
  • 2023 Second Prize in the 20th Information Security and Countermeasure Technology Competition
  • 2023 Excellent Award in Beijing Institute of Technology Mathematical Modeling Competition
  • 2022 Second Prize in Beijing Institute of Technology Mingli Cup Freshman Mathematics Competition
  • 2022 Best Courage Award in Lianshan Control Programming Freshman Competition

items.title: About me
items.content_html:
# Hello!

Hi! I’m CKTi. A college student. Here is my blog, you can find something I have done.

My major now is cyber security and I’m now intrested in privacy and deep learning and so on, here are some articles about some notes in learning.

I’m also an amartar drummer in a band playing J-Pop and anime songs, you can see our band’s live record in our bilibili page. In the future, I will publish some drum tabs in my blog (If I have time).

If you have any suggestions or anything want to say to me, you can submit comments in each of the articles, or just contact me in email. Have a nice day!
